amendment.description: Amendment clarifies the notification provisions of the bill to provide that the particularity requirement contained in the bill does not exclude the use of layman's terms.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 and printed in Part 2 of H. Rept. 106-134 to allow Year 2000 notifications to be drafted using layman's terms.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
